metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious GoogleUpdate Child Process
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "GoogleUpdate.exe"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\googleupdate.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\google')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\setup.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('chrome_updater.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('chrome_installer.exe'))) OR process.name is null))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of "GoogleUpdate.exe"
